document.full_text: vittorio arrigoni apparently died at the hands of a fringe group of palestinians, raising embarrassing questions for hamas about the security it says it has restored in gaza.
document.title: gaza killing of italian activist deals a blow to hamas
lines_and_colors: vittorio arrigoni apparently died at the hands of a fringe group of palestinians, raising embarrassing questions for hamas about the security it says it has restored in gaza.
